actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that in order to seize unique scientific opportunities the Federal commitment to biomedical research should be tripled over a ten year period beginning in 1999.
short_title: Resolution for the Tripling of Biomedical Research
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Resolution for the Tripling of Biomedical Research - Expresses the sense of the Senate that appropriations for the National Institutes of Health should be tripled over the ten-year period from FY 1999 to 2008.

titles.title: Resolution for the Tripling of Biomedical Research

A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that in order to seize unique scientific opportunities the Federal commitment to biomedical research should be tripled over a ten year period beginning in 1999.
